channel.title: Need help...One thing, triggering things? o.o
channel.description: Alright look, I have this food stall that I need to make so when you steal from it you get a random food, I want to be able to make the items I want to come from the stall, but the problem is...I don't know how, so can I rely on moparisthebest.com/smf forums? :P Help me out guys.

item.title: Need help...One thing, triggering things? o.o
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

hydromcmac2:

ok, What do I change to make the random items what I want?.. oh and thanks for your help.[br][size=1]Posted on: January 26, 2007, 11:08:57 PM[/size][hr]hmm? lol.[br][size=1]Posted on: January 26, 2007, 11:15:55 PM[/size][hr]…?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 26, 2007, 11:20:15 PM[/size][hr]dododoododododoo.

You should know considering you claim credit for loading graphics from config files, not to mention all of these other brilliant tutorials that you didn’t actually make or even understand.

Read full topic
